field.label: Body Font Size
field.comment: Give value in pixels. i.e 14px.

group.label: Page Wrapper and Main Content Settings

field.label: Custom Blog background Image Style
field.comment:
Type in your custom styles , e.g.:
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-attachment: fixed;

Type in your custom styles , e.g.:

field.label: Custom Footer Style
field.comment:
Type in your custom styles , e.g.:
.classname {
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-attachment: fixed;
}

field.label: Custom Box Style
field.comment:
Type in your custom styles , e.g.:

    background-size: cover;
    background-attachment: fixed;

group.label: Home Page And Sidebar Content Settings

field.label: Static Block For Home Page Content
field.comment: Add static block identifier to display content on home page.

field.comment: Dislay Slider in full and boxed width.

field.label: Static Block For Sidebar Content 1
field.comment: Add static block identifier to display content on sidebar.

field.comment: Add static block identifier to display content on sidebar.

field.label: Show About Us Link in Footer
Addthis Pub ID
field.comment: You can get pub id from http://www.addthis.com

field.label: Show Related, Upsell and Crosssell Products
Loader Diaply on?
field.comment:
Only On Home Page: Loader display only on home page.
All Pages: Loader display on all pages.

field.label: Static Blocks
field.comment: Click this button to create all static blocks provided with Shiney theme.

field.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
field.comment: If the identifiers of the static blocks are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import Static Blocks" button.

field.label: CMS Pages
field.comment: Click this button to create all CMS pages provided with Shiney theme.

field.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
field.comment: If the identifiers of the cms pages are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import CMS Pages" button.

field.label: Demo Data
field.comment: Click to import all extension data provided with Shiney theme.
